Letter Struct Reference

Detailed Description

for locale initialization. Provided struct constructs std::ctype::ctype by supplying the ctype<char> constructor with ctype::mask. Returned std::ctype<char> is a locale::facet which can be used to filter valid english alphanumeric characters by using: std::ifstream.imbue(std::locale(std::locale(), new letter_only()));
